<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// erase&#95;one - Erase one element from the queue, regardless of its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// position. This operation performs a linear search to find an element</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// equal to t, but then uses all logarithmic-time algorithms to do</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the erase operation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a89ce59a53dfd16d3194518d0c209ff97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a89ce59a53dfd16d3194518d0c209ff97">erase&#95;one</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;t) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Linear-search to find the element.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sequence::size&#95;type i = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(this-&gt;c, t) - this-&gt;c.begin();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Logarithmic-time heap bubble-up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (i != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Sequence::size&#95;type parent = (i - 1) / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">      this-&gt;c&#91;i&#93; = this-&gt;c&#91;parent&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">      i = parent;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The element we want to remove is now at the root, so we can use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// priority&#95;queue&#39;s plain pop to remove it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">    this-&gt;pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// reheapify - If an element in the queue has changed in a way that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// affects its standing in the comparison function, the queue&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// internal state becomes invalid. Calling reheapify() resets the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// queue&#39;s state, making it valid again. This operation has time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// complexity proportional to the number of elements in the queue,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// so don&#39;t plan to use it a lot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a79d40f085693726bbebb3a1d67303c01"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a79d40f085693726bbebb3a1d67303c01">reheapify</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::make&#95;heap(this-&gt;c.begin(), this-&gt;c.end(), this-&gt;comp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// clear - Erase all elements from the queue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a583627bbdd690ca5df5ed7b00a5f7b18"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue/#a583627bbdd690ca5df5ed7b00a5f7b18">clear</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">    this-&gt;c.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
